title: Budweiser
data: Example E2 TV service audio streaming
Stop debugging (copy file first to keep)

AACURL: (/usr/bin/gst-launch-1.0 souphttpsrc location=%(URL)s ! decodebin ! queue2 use-buffering=true max-size-buffers=%(BUFFERS)s max-size-bytes=0 max-size-time=0 ! %(DEVICE)s)>/dev/null 2>&1
AACURLhttps: (/usr/bin/wget -qO- %(URL)s|/usr/bin/gst-launch-1.0 fdsrc fd=0 ! decodebin ! queue2 use-buffering=true max-size-buffers=%(BUFFERS)s max-size-bytes=0 max-size-time=0 ! %(DEVICE)s)>/dev/null 2>&1
E2URL: (/usr/bin/gst-launch-1.0 souphttpsrc location=%(URL)s ! tsdemux ! audio/mpeg ! fdsink fd=1 |/usr/bin/mpg123 -o wav -|/usr/bin/gst-launch-1.0 fdsrc fd=0 ! decodebin ! queue2 use-buffering=true max-size-buffers=%(BUFFERS)s max-size-bytes=0 max-size-time=0 ! %(DEVICE)s)>/dev/null 2>&1
IPTVURL: (/usr/bin/gst-launch-1.0 souphttpsrc location=%(URL)s ! tsdemux ! audio/mpeg ! decodebin ! queue2 use-buffering=true max-size-buffers=%(BUFFERS)s max-size-bytes=0 max-size-time=0 ! %(DEVICE)s)>/dev/null 2>&1

what_is_this: Example audio sources, operation types, and general configuration for the Extensions/Plugins/Budweiser plugin.
author: @oottppxx
